Text: This Torrent downloads the Movies Essex Boys with German language over Dub language track.  This Movie is in German.
Its german. I mean, its german!!!! You could have at least added the bluddy language of the film in the tittle. Here is TvTeam showing just how great they are.
No where does it state that the film is in german. How do you upload this garbage?

German audio... Do not download.
How Germans (and many others) do it? They remove ALL audio from the movie, and then they insert their own. The result is terrible. Even basic sounds, like door closing, are improvised and usually out of sync.

This is great picture quality and the only version on the bay. I think some ppl need to show a little more appreciation, especially with TvTeam going to the trouble of uploading this classic British gangster movie in the first place. I for one, am very grateful. Cheers.
In German so useless to me - I wish I'd bothered to read the comments. Ah well my mistake. DELETE
